wishlist.name: Venti C6
wishlist.text: "Wait Venti is your main, why is he so low on the list???" BECAUSE HE'S ALREADY C2 WITH POLAR STAR. He's Fine. I'll get his cons when I got rolls to spare, but new characters and DPS are prioritized.

wishlist.name: Raiden

wishlist.text: Mostly so my theoretical Raiden doesn't get lonely, but also because I need more AFK electro for Tighnari and Nahida
